Key Match Events: Riley Greene doubled off the wall in dead center to make it 3-1
Brenan Hanifee threw two scoreless innings
Brant Hurter allowed just two hits and one run in four innings
Tyler Holton got the Tigers within one out of the win
Pre-Game Insights: The Tigers clinched a playoff spot for the first time in a decade
The team has done nothing but win over the past 40 games
Thereâ€™s still a chance to finish with an even better seed
Scott Harris sent Flaherty to the Dodgers, Mark Canha to the Giants, and Andrew Chafin and Carson Kelly to the Rangers at the trade deadline
Post-Match Reflections: The last 10 years have been tough to watch
The Tigers have ended their playoff drought
The winning percentage is lower than 35-5, but it was so much more unexpected
The Tigers have to love their chances to jump out to a 1-0 lead in the wild card round
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game ended with Wenceel Perez squeezing the final out despite a mini collision with Parker Meadows
The Tigers are 54-26 in games Meadows played in this season
Kerry Carpenter is batting.295 with a.355 on-base percentage, nine homers, and six doubles since Aug. 13
